para.text: is a Lister-plugin for Total Commander, which can play WAV, MP3, MP2, MP1, Ogg Vorbis, WMA and MIDI files, using BASS sound system (bass.dll, basswma.dll). It also supports MOD music and MO3 music(MO3, IT, XM, S3M, MTM, MOD, UMX formats) using BASS's native function. Also you can open PlayLists (m3u and pls).

para.text: Pentium 2 (AMD K6-2) processor 266 MHz or above
